name: Agathac
description:
Agatha provides a new way of scratching your brain thanks to an innovative gameplay. It’s a kind of escape room game, but funnier and more intuitive. You have to find the way to solve each puzzle to access the next one.  In each level, your reflexion and imagination are tested.

Don't hesitate to contact Aghatac on twitter to ask clues if you are locked or suggest your ideas for new levels :)
